item.title: Asheville Night-Time Walking Ghost Tour
item.description: Take a spooky stroll through the streets of downtown Asheville on this ghost walking tour. Led by an expert local guide, learn about the area’s hair-raising tales and dark history, like the woman who haunts the Omni Grove Park Inn, the body entombed in the wall of the Basilica of St. Lawrence, and much more. It's a fascinating, spine-tingling adventure.

image.alt: Asheville Night-Time Walking Ghost Tour

item.title: 2-Hour Guided Segway Tour of Asheville
item.description: Explore the "Paris of the South"—Asheville, North Carolina—on a Segway during this 2-hour guided tour. Traveling via Segway allows you to cover much more ground than you would on foot, which makes this a great comprehensive tour for first-time visitors. You'll get lessons on how to maneuver the 2-wheeled, self-balancing electric scooter before you depart; even beginners will feel safe and comfortable.

image.alt: 2-Hour Guided Segway Tour of Asheville

item.title: Blue Ridge Parkway Waterfalls Hiking Tour from Asheville
item.description: Hike the best of the Blue Ridge Parkway on this guided day trip to three scenic waterfalls from Asheville. Take in views of the mountains as you tour the classic road in a comfortable van and hear stories about the area’s natural history and culture from your local guide. Watch for blooming laurels and rhododendron as you walk the easy to moderate trails through lush oak and hickory forests. Enjoy light refreshments along the way with plenty of time to relax by the falls before returning to Asheville.

image.alt: Blue Ridge Parkway Waterfalls Hiking Tour from Asheville

item.title: Asheville Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Trolley Tour
item.description: Skip the stress of navigating Asheville's winding streets—and hunting for parking. This classic trolley tour lets you relax while guides reveal the city’s best gems across eight diverse districts, from Montford's historic mansions to South Slope's craft breweries. You can follow your urges, too: Hop on and off during this 90-minute journey to explore at your own pace, no maps or parking fees required.

image.alt: Asheville Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Trolley Tour

item.title: Asheville Insider Guided Walking Tour
item.description: Maximize time in Asheville with a guided walking tour focused on the city’s history, architecture, and culture. Meet your guide for a sightseeing tour including top landmarks like the Thomas Wolfe Memorial, Grove Arcade, and the Basilica of Saint Lawrence. Get to know the unique city of Asheville from the perspective of a local.

image.alt: Asheville Insider Guided Walking Tour

item.title: Gem Mining and Goat Farm Walking Tour in Hendersonville
item.description: Enjoy a day of family-friendly fun at Elijah Mountain Gem Mine and Goat Farm. Suitable for all ages, mine for gems and fossils along indoor and outdoor water flumes and keep whatever you find. Explore the property, tackle an obstacle course, visit the goats in the goat barn, and see peacocks, pheasants, and more in the aviary.

image.alt: Gem Mining and Goat Farm Walking Tour in Hendersonville

item.title: Downtown Asheville Guided Brewery Walking Tour
item.description: Asheville’s reputation as one of the top cities for brews in the Southeast is well-deserved, but the huge number of breweries to choose from can be intimidating for visitors. Discover which breweries are worth the hype on this Asheville brewery tour, which takes you to craft breweries with behind-the-scene access and ample pours at each. Unlike other Asheville brewery tours, this one is led by a certified cicerone, a recognized expert when it comes to beer.

image.alt: Downtown Asheville Guided Brewery Walking Tour

item.title: Downtown Asheville Tip-Based Sightseeing Walking Tour
item.description: Maximize time in Downtown Asheville with a sightseeing tour led by a local guide. Learn about Asheville's history and culture during a city stroll that includes breweries, distilleries, cafes, and historic sites. See popular landmarks like the Basilica of St. Lawrence, Grove Arcade, and the Leaf Global Arts Center. Taste local beer and spirits during brewery and distillery visits. In lieu of a tour ticket, tip your guide whatever amount you find fair.

image.alt: Downtown Asheville Tip-Based Sightseeing Walking Tour

item.title: Waterfall Hike and Jeep Excursion - Waterfall Hiking Tour
item.description: Asheville pops out of the Blue Ridge Mountains, one of the most biodiverse spots on Earth. On this tour, simply meet up with your small group, take a short ride into Pisgah National Forest, and follow the way into the “Land of Waterfalls.” Your guide will provide hiking poles, rain gear, water, snacks, and plenty of knowledge to deepen your experience in this incredible slice of Mother Nature.

image.alt: Waterfall Hike and Jeep Excursion - Waterfall Hiking Tour

item.title: Electric Bike Brewery Crawl of Asheville
item.description: Cycle to three of Asheville’s most popular microbreweries, enjoying a drink at the first location. You’ll be riding a state-of-the-art e-bike, so the hills won’t be a problem. In addition to soaking up the local vibe and great scenery, you’ll sample some of the best craft brews in town. If you like beer and bikes, you'll love this tour.

image.alt: Electric Bike Brewery Crawl of Asheville

item.title: Privately Guided Half Day Hike
item.description: Discover the natural beauty that lies just outside of Asheville by booking a guided hike. This private experience can be tailored to your needs and preferences, whether you want a challenging adventure or an easy-going walk. Depending on where you go, your tour may include waterfalls, mountain views, or biodiverse forests.

image.alt: Privately Guided Half Day Hike

item.title: Mountaintop Yoga & Meditation Hike in Asheville
item.description: Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains. This small-group tour from Nashville starts out with a hike through the forest. At the summit, you'll stretch out your (provided) mat, soak up the views, and unwind as you move through a mountaintop yoga class, which is appropriate for all levels.

image.alt: Mountaintop Yoga & Meditation Hike in Asheville

item.title: Asheville Terrors: Ghosts of the Blue Ridge
item.description: Discover the spooky side of Asheville with this small-group nighttime walking tour. Meet your guide for a city stroll focused on Asheville's haunted and paranormally active locations. Hear stories about local history as you walk past landmarks including the Basilica of St. Lawrence, Battery Park Hotel, and Pack's Tavern. Choose between two different tour lengths depending on your needs and interests.

image.alt: Asheville Terrors: Ghosts of the Blue Ridge

item.title: Guided Horseback Ride through Flame Azalea and Fern Forest
item.description: Horseback riding through the Blue Ridge Mountains is a beautiful way to explore the area’s natural attractions. Trot through fern groves, past rows of wild flame azaleas, and into a white pine forest on well-trained, gentle horses. This tour includes a safety training, too, making it a good choice for beginner horseback riders and children.

image.alt: Guided Horseback Ride through Flame Azalea and Fern Forest

item.title: Scenic Driving Tour of the Blue Ridge Mountains
item.description: Check out the Blue Ridge Parkway without having to keep your eyes on the road with this chauffeur-driven tour. Your naturalist driver will do the driving, pointing out special sights and teaching you about the natural history of the area along the way. You'll also have the chance to stop for a hike and some photos before returning to Asheville.

image.alt: Scenic Driving Tour of the Blue Ridge Mountains

item.title: Asheville Signature Guided Brewery Tour
item.description: The Signature Asheville Brew Tour is the perfect introduction to Asheville's impressive and world-renowned craft beverage scene. On this compact, three-and-a-half-hour adventure, you will go behind the scenes, drink with the locals, and taste a variety of up to 12 delicious beers at three of Asheville's best craft alcohol producers. All while enjoying a tasty snack to soak up all those delicious suds.

image.alt: Asheville Signature Guided Brewery Tour

item.title: Custom Half-Day Photo Tour with Photography Lessons from Asheville
item.description: Sharpen your photography skills with a custom half-day photo tour from Asheville. Get picked up at your hotel and meet your guide for a private photography-focused tour. Personalize the itinerary according to your interests and set out for a trip into the Blue Ridge Mountains. Learn new techniques from a professional photographer and bring home stellar photographs.

image.alt: Custom Half-Day Photo Tour with Photography Lessons from Asheville

item.title: Privately Guided Full Day Hike
item.description: Get out into nature and experience the beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains on this private full-day guided hike from Asheville. The experience will be tailored to your interests and preferences. Choose the distance you want to hike, and your guide will take care of the rest. Includes a picnic lunch and trekking poles, if requested.

image.alt: Privately Guided Full Day Hike

item.title: Half Day Hike - Water Falls
item.description: Get out of town for a half-day hike up to scenic waterfalls with this small-group hiking experience for up to four people. Your certified naturalist guide will lead you and your group on a challenging hike up to beautiful waterfalls, teaching you how to identify local plant life along the way.

image.alt: Half Day Hike - Water Falls

item.title: Carolina Waterfalls and Highlands Private VIP Boutique Tour
item.description: North Carolina’s highlands have miles of quiet trails, scenic overlooks, and tranquil backdrops perfect for photo sessions. Join this tour to see everything from quaint towns to stunning cliffs surrounding the Asheville area. Your guide will zoom you through the highlands, passing by landmarks like the Cullasaja River Gorge and the town of Dillard. You’ll stop for photos at Looking Glass Falls and Whiteside Mountain, as well as walk the Cliffside Lake and Trail.

image.alt: Carolina Waterfalls and Highlands Private VIP Boutique Tour

item.title: Private Waterfall and Blue Ridge Parkway Tour with a Naturalist
item.description: A great choice for families, wedding parties, and groups of friends, this tour takes you into Pisgah National Forest to explore the Appalachian Mountains. Tours are customized according to interests and hiking ability: choose a summit hike or easier trails and visit scenic waterfalls along the way. Your local guide is also a naturalist and can identify resident flora and fauna. Organic snacks are included.

image.alt: Private Waterfall and Blue Ridge Parkway Tour with a Naturalist

item.title: French Broad Whitewater Rafting near Asheville, North Carolina
item.description:
This trip is perfect for ever experience level, from beginner to experienced rafters and for individuals, families, or couples!
We are the longest continually operating outfitter on the French Broad and our professionally trained guides will navigate you down the river, sharing the French Broad’s rich history, and pointing out flora and fauna.

image.alt: French Broad Whitewater Rafting near Asheville, North Carolina

item.title: French Broad River Kayak Tour in Asheville
item.description: Take a kayak trip along the French Broad River with this semi-private tour led by a naturalist. You'll paddle through town, passing local attractions such as the Biltmore Estate along the way. Your guide will be on hand to provide narration and answer any question you have about the natural world around you.

image.alt: French Broad River Kayak Tour in Asheville

item.title: Half-Day Tour With Instruction in Vistas & Waterfall Photography
item.description: Perfect your photography skills with this half-day tour with a husband-and-wife photographer team. You'll take your own car and head out into the Blue Ridge Mountain region, home to beautiful viewpoints, forests, and waterfalls—great for nature photography. Your instructors will be on hand to teach you tricks of the trade and help you improve your skills.

image.alt: Half-Day Tour With Instruction in Vistas & Waterfall Photography
